entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
